# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README overlap.cir overlap.cir.sh tags options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/overlap.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_548/overlap.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} overlap.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} overlap.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_548/overlap.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_548/overlap.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;2d;errorexit;pde")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_548/overlap.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} overlap.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} overlap.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_548/overlap.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_548/overlap.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;2d;errorexit;pde")
endif()
